testcase.name: increment the value for a single counter in the collection
lock a single counter in the collection and try to increment it

failure.message: Then I should see an error "counter with name onecounter is locked": Failed asserting that '{"value":2,"status":"active","name":"onecounter"}' matches PCRE pattern "/counter with name onecounter is locked/i".
